description:
Special toilet-centric episode! Chased by Natsumi, Keroro holes up in the bathroom and tries to survive with whatever is on hand. Later, Keroro and company are in town when they`re struck by the need to relieve themselves all at the same time, but can`t seem to find an available toilet.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Restroom Survival / Keroro vs Giroro vs Tamama vs Dororo
ケロロ トイレでサバイバル! であります / ケロロ 対ギロロ対タママ対ドロロ であります
